text:
(a)     Establishment of Fund. The Mayor's Voluntary Arts Contribution Fund is established as a category eight fund for the purpose of receiving all donations or grants of money and property which may be offered to the City and County for its use and benefit to promote and provide services to nonprofit arts organizations pursuant to 
Chapter 51 of the San Francisco Administrative Code. 
     (b)     Use of Fund. The monies are to be expended for the purposes designated in 
Chapter 51 of the San Francisco Administrative Code. 
(Added by Ord. 316-00, File No. 001911, App. 12/28/2000)
